addUser: INSERT INTO userTable(userName, userEmail, userPassword) VALUES ('{userName}','{userEmail}','{userPassword}')
addNotes: INSERT INTO userNotes(Title, Content, ownerID) VALUES ('{Title}', '{Content}', '{ownerID}')
updateNote: UPDATE userNotes SET Title = '{Title}', Content = '{Content}' where notesID = '{notesID}'
